title: karai EtriDu tAyE
sahitya:
karai EtriDu tAyE ennaiyALum karuNaikkaDal nIyE


anupallavi

  varaiyillAda vAnaDivE varuvAi guruvAi paradEvataiyE
vANI lakSmI kALi mahEshvari vAcAmagOcari aim shrIm klIm krIm hrIm


caraNam 1    shOka mOhamillA eKAgra cittamum donda bandhamillA sutantra uLLamum
yOga bhOga saubhAgyamum udaviyE unniccai niraivEra ennai ATkoNDE
    caraNam 2    nenjam ariyaNaiyAi nEyam tirumuDiyAi panca ghOSattaiyum parama sAmrAjyamAkki
anjAda tunjAda kenjAda sutantra Ananda samayOgam anaivarkkum poduvAgi karaiyETriDu tAyE
